translation.value: Molimo da pričekajte 5 minuta pre nego napravite još jedan nalog

translation.value: Morate biti ulogirani da bi videli Vaš rang

translation.value: Morate biti ulogirani da bi videli svoj cilj

translation.value: Već ste obavestili da {str:PlayerName} treba biti bannovan

Switch language to english ?
You can change the language of this mod using the command /language.
translation.value: Možeš promeniti jezik na ovom modu koristeći naredbu /language.

translation.key: If your language is not available, you can help with translation (/help translate).
translation.value: Ako tvoj jezik nije dostupan, možeš nam pomoći sa prevodom (/help translate).

translation.key: InfectionClass, by necropotame (version {str:VersionCode})
Based on the concept of Infection mod by Gravity
translation.value: Zasnovano na konceptu Infection mod od Gravity

translation.key: Main contributors: {str:ListOfContributors}
Thanks to {str:ListOfContributors}
No player was found with this name
translation.value: Nije nađen igrač sa tim imenom

translation.key: Rules of the game
InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.
translation.value: InfectionClass je timska igra između ljudi i zaraženih.

translation.key: All players start as human.
10 seconds later, two players become infected.
translation.value: 10 sekundi posle, dva igrača postanu zaražena.

translation.key: The goal for humans is to survive until the army clean the map.
translation.value: Cilj za ljude je preživeti sve dok vojska ne očisti mapu.

translation.key: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.
translation.value: Cilj za zaražene je zaraziti sve ljude.

translation.key: How to translate the mod
Create an account on Crowdin and join a translation team:
translation.value: Napravi nalog na Crowdin-u i pridruži se timu prevoditelja:

translation.key: For any question about the translation process, please contact us on IRC ({str:IRCAddress})
translation.value: Za pitanja o procesu prevođenja, molimo da nas kontaktirate na IRC ({str:IRCAddress})

translation.key: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.
translation.value: Inženjer može raditi zidove sa čekićem.

translation.key: When an infected touch the wall, he dies.
translation.value: Kada zaraženi dotakne zid, on umre.

translation.key: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan}, and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Zid radi {sec:LifeSpan}, a jedan igrač može napraviti samo jedan zid u isto vreme.

translation.key: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.
translation.value: Vojnik može postavljati lebdeće bombe sa čekićem.

translation.key: Each bomb can explode {int:NumBombs} times.
Use the hammer to place the bomb and explode it multiple times.
translation.value: Uzmi čekić za postavljanje bombi i aktiviranje više puta.

translation.key: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Bombe su ograničene na jednog igrača u isto vreme.

translation.key: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: Znanstvenik može postaviti ledbeće mine sa čekićem.

translation.key: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.
translation.one: Mine su ograničene na {int:NumMines} za igrača u isto vreme.
translation.few: Mine su ograničene na {int:NumMines} po igraču u isto vreme.
translation.other: Mine su ograničene na {int:NumMines} po igraču u isto vreme.

translation.key: He has also grenades that teleport him.
translation.value: Ima i granate koje ga teleportiraju.

translation.key: The biologist has a shotgun with bouncing bullets and can create a spring laser trap by shooting with his rifle.
translation.value: Biolog ima sačmaru sa mecima koji odskaču od zidova i može da stvori lasersku zamku uz pomoć svoje laserske puške.

translation.key: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.
translation.value: Lečnik može dati ljudima oklop pomoću svog čekića.

translation.key: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.
translation.value: Ima i snažnu sačmaru koji odbacuje zaražene.

translation.key: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.
translation.value: Heroj ima sačmaru, lasersku pušku i granate.

translation.key: The Hero must find a flag hidden in the map.
translation.value: Heroj mora naći zastavu skrivenu u mapi.

translation.key: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.
translation.value: Kad ju uzme, zastava daje 1 zdravlje, 4 oklopa, i punu municiju svim ljudima, te puno zdravlje i oklop za heroja.

translation.key: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.
translation.value: Heroja ne može izlečiti lečnik, ali on može izdržati napad zaraženog ako ima dovoljno zdravlja.

translation.key: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected during three seconds.
translation.value: Nindža može bacati flash granate koje zalede zaražene na tri sekunde.

translation.key: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.
translation.one: Njegov čekić je zamenjen katanom, može skočiti jedan put pre nego padne.
translation.few: Njegov čekić je zamenjen katanom, može skočiti {int:NinjaJump} puta pre nego padne.
translation.other: Njegov čekić je zamenjen katanom, može skočiti {int:NinjaJump} puta pre nego padne.

translation.key: The Mercenary fly in air using his machine gun.
translation.value: Plaćenik leti vazduhom koristeći se machine gunom.

translation.key: He can coil explosives with his hammer that hinder infected from harming.
translation.value: On može naviti eksplozive pomoću svog čekića koji onemoguće zaraženima škoditi.

translation.key: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points.
translation.one: Može bacati otrovne granate od kojih svaka deli {int:NumDamagePoints} bod štete.
translation.few: Može bacati otrovne granate od kojih svaka deli {int:NumDamagePoints} boda štete.
translation.other: Može bacati otrovne granate od kojih svaka deli {int:NumDamagePoints} bodova štete.

translation.key: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.
translation.value: Snajper može zaključati svoju poziciju u vazduhu na 15 sekundi koristeći se čekićem.

translation.key: He can jump two times in air.
translation.value: Može skočiti dva puta u vazduh.

translation.key: He has also a powerful rifle that deals 30 damage points in locked position, and 10–13 otherwise.
translation.value: Ima i snažnu pušku koja deli 30 škodnih bodova u zaključanoj poziciji, a 10–13 bodova inače.

translation.key: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Pušač može zaraziti ljude i lečiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: He can also inflict 4 damage points per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Nanosi 4 škodnih boda po sekundi kad huka ljude.

translation.key: The Boomer explodes when he attack.
All humans affected by the explosion become infected.
translation.value: Svi ljudi zahvaćeni eksplozijom postanu zaraženi.

translation.key: He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Može naneti 1 škodan bod po sekundi kada huka ljude.

translation.key: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Lovac može zaraziti ljude i lečiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Duh može zaraziti ljude i lečiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes a damage or if he use his hammer.
translation.value: Nevidljiv je, osim ako je čovek blizu, ako primi udarac ili ako koristi čekić.

translation.key: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Pauk može zaraziti ljude i lečiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: When selecting any gun, his hook enter in web mode.
translation.value: Kada selektira neko oružje, njegov huk prelazi u mrežu.

translation.key: Any human that touch a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.
translation.value: Kada čovek dotakne mrežu, ona ga automatski dohvati.

translation.key: The hook of the spider (in both mode) deal 1 damage point per second and can grab a human during 2 seconds.
translation.value: Paukov huk (u oba moda) nanosi 1 škodan bod po sekundi i može držati čoveka 2 sekunde.

translation.key: The Ghoul can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Zloduh može zaražava ljude i da leči zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: He can devore all that has died close to him, which makes him stronger, faster and more resistant.
translation.value: On može da izjede sve što je umrlo blizu njega, što ga čini snažnijim, bržim i otpornijim.

translation.key: Thereupon he digests his fodder bit by bit going back to his normal state, and besides, death bereaves him of his nourishment.
translation.value: Odmah nakon što svari svoju hranu malo pomalo vraća u svoje normalno stanje, i sem toga, smrt ucvili njega od svoje hrane.

translation.key: The Slug can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Puž može da zaražava ljude i da leči zaražene sa svojim čekićem.

translation.key: He can make the ground and walls toxic by spreading slime with his hammer.
translation.value: On može prekriti pod i zidove otrovnom sluzi svojim čekićem.

translation.key: Touching the slime inflicts three damage points in three seconds on a human.
translation.value: Dodirivanje sluzi daje ljudima tri poena štete za tri sekunde.

translation.key: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Undead može zaraziti ljude i lečiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: Instead of dying, he freezes during 10 seconds.
translation.value: Umesto da umre, on se zaledi na 10 sekundi.

translation.key: If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappear.
translation.value: Ako ga zaraženi izleči, odledit će se.

translation.key: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Veštica može zaraziti ljude i lečiti zaražene svojim čekićem.

translation.key: When an infected dies, he may re-spawn near her.
translation.value: Kada zaraženi umre, ponovo će se stvoriti kod nje.

translation.key: If the Witch dies, she disappear and is replaced by an another class of infected.
translation.value: Ako Veštica umre, ona nestaje i zamenjena je drugom klasom zaraženih.

translation.key: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Može naneti 1 škodan bod po sekundi kada huka ljude.

translation.key: Targeted chat messages
Use "/msg <PlayerName> <My Message>" to send a private message to this player.
translation.value: Koristi »/msg <korisnik> <poruka moja>« da bi slao/slala privatne poruke.

translation.key: Use "/msg !<ClassName> <My Message>" to send a private message to all player with a specific class.
translation.value: Koristi »/msg !<ime klase> <poruka moja>« da bi poslao/poslala privatnu poruku svim igračima jedne specifične klase.

translation.key: Example: "/msg !medic I'm wounded!"
Use "/msg !near" to send a private message to all players near you.
translation.value: Koristi »/msg !near\« da bi poslao/poslala privatne poruke svim igračima blizu tebe.

translation.key: Choose a help page with /help <page>
Available help pages: {str:PageList}
A random class will be automatically attributed to you when rounds start
translation.value: Nasumična klasa će ti biti dodeljena kada započne runda

translation.key: The class selector will be displayed when rounds start
translation.value: Selektor za klase će ti se prikazati kada runda započne

translation.key: Unknown language
Available languages: {str:ListOfLanguage}
List of commands
Press <F3> or <F4> to enable or disable hook protection
translation.value: Pritisni <F3> ili <F4> da bi dopustio ili zabranio zaštitu protiv hukanja

translation.key: You hold a bonus area for one minute, +5 points
translation.value: Držao si bonus područje za jedan minut, +5 poena

translation.key: You are frozen: {sec:EffectDuration}
Random choice

Stomach filled by {percent:FodderInStomach}

The undead is finally dead

Sword strength increased
Grenade limit increased
Type "/help {str:ClassName}" for more information about your class
translation.value: Napiši »/help {str:ClassName}\« za više informacija o svojoj klasi

translation.key: The Hero found the flag!
